piece - package piece
 
piece.position - package piece.position
 
PieceColor - Enum Class in piece
The `PieceColor` enumeration is used to represent the color of a chess piece, which can be either black or white.
PieceMove - Class in piece.position
The PieceMove class represents a move from one PiecePosition to another in a game.
PieceMove(PiecePosition, PiecePosition) - Constructor for class piece.position.PieceMove
The PieceMove constructor assigns the from and to positions for a piece movement.
PiecePosition - Class in piece.position
The PiecePosition class represents the position of a piece on a board using row and column coordinates.
PiecePosition(int, int) - Constructor for class piece.position.PiecePosition
The constructor of `PiecePosition` maps input row and column values to corresponding enums `PiecePositionRow` and `PiecePositionColumn`.
PiecePosition(PiecePositionRow, PiecePositionColumn) - Constructor for class piece.position.PiecePosition
The constructor of PiecePosition sets the row and column of a piece on a board.
PiecePositionColumn - Enum Class in piece.position
This enumeration represents the columns on a chessboard, with each enum constant representing a column from A to H.
PiecePositionRow - Enum Class in piece.position
This enumeration represents the rows on a chessboard, with each enum constant representing a row from 1 to 8.
PieceType - Enum Class in piece
The `PieceType` enum consists of the following constants: `None`, `Pawn`, `Rook`, `Knight`, `Bishop`, `Queen`, and `King` that represent a type of chess piece.

The constructir initializes a Player object with a given name and piece color.
possibleMoves(PiecePosition) - Method in class piece.ChessPiece
The function possibleMoves returns an array of PiecePosition objects representing the possible moves from a given currentPosition.
